instruction: Use Django to create an online poll application.
buggy_code:
django-admin startproject poll_project cd poll_project python manage.py startapp polls from django.db import models class Poll(models.Model): question = models.CharField(max_length=200) pub_date = models.DateTimeField('date published') from django.http import HttpResponse from django.shortcuts import render from polls.models import Poll def index(request): return latest_poll_list = Poll.objects.order_by('-pub_date')[:5] context = {'latest_poll_list': latest_poll_list} return render(request, 'polls/index.html', context) from django.urls import path from . import views urlpatterns = [ path('', views.index, name='index'), ] from django.contrib import admin from django.urls import include, path urlpatterns = [ path('polls/', include('polls.urls')), path('admin/', admin.site.urls), ] My Polls {% if latest_poll_list %}
    {% for poll in latest_poll_list %}
  • {{ poll.question }}
    • {% endfor %}
{% else %}

No polls are available.

{% endif %}
